title: How to Convert HTML to Plain Text: Strip Tags and Extract Content
content:
## Introduction Extracting plain text from HTML is essential for content processing, email fallbacks, search indexing, and accessibility. Our free HTML to Text converter strips all HTML markup, leaving you with clean, readable text content. ## Key Takeaways - Strip all HTML tags instantly - Preserve paragraph structure with line breaks - Decode HTML entities to characters - Optional link URL extraction - Clean text ready for any use ## What is HTML to Text Conversion? HTML to Text conversion removes all markup from HTML content, leaving only the visible text. Tags, attributes, scripts, and styles are removed while text content is preserved. ### What Gets Removed - All HTML tags (
,

, , etc.) - Attributes (class, id, style, etc.) - Script and style blocks - HTML comments - Inline event handlers ### What Gets Preserved - Visible text content - Basic structure (via line breaks) - Decoded special characters - Link URLs (optional) ## Why Convert HTML to Plain Text? ### 1. Email Plain Text Version Every HTML email needs a text alternative: - Required for accessibility - Fallback for text-only clients - Spam filter optimization - Better deliverability ### 2. Content Indexing Prepare content for search: - Full-text search databases - Content analysis tools - Machine learning input - Data processing pipelines ### 3. Accessibility Improve content access: - Screen reader optimization - Text-only displays - Low-bandwidth viewing - Content simplification ### 4. Data Extraction Pull content from HTML: - Web scraping cleanup - Document processing - Content migration - Archive creation ## Common Use Cases ### Email Marketing - Create text version of HTML emails - Ensure all subscribers can read content - Meet email client requirements - Improve deliverability rates ### Content Processing - Extract article text from web pages - Prepare content for NLP analysis - Create search indexes - Build content databases ### Document Conversion - Extract text from HTML documents - Prepare for format conversion - Create accessible versions - Archive web content ### Developer Tools - Debug HTML content - Test content rendering - Validate text extraction - Compare text versions ## Step-by-Step Guide ### Step 1: Input HTML Paste your HTML code into the input area: - Complete HTML documents - HTML fragments or snippets - Rich text from editors - Content from any source ### Step 2: Configure Options Choose extraction settings: - **Preserve line breaks**: Keep paragraph structure - **Extract link URLs**: Include [url] after links - **Decode entities**: Convert & to & etc. - **Trim whitespace**: Clean up extra spaces ### Step 3: Convert Click Convert to extract plain text. Processing is instant and happens in your browser. ### Step 4: Use Output - Copy to clipboard - Download as .txt file - Use in your projects ## Features and Capabilities ### Extraction Options | Option | Effect | |--------|--------| | Preserve breaks | Adds newlines for p, br, headings | | Extract links | Shows URL after link text | | Decode entities | & becomes & | | Trim whitespace | Removes extra spaces and blank lines | ### Element Handling | Element | Behavior | |---------|----------| | p, div | Content + line break | | br | Line break | | h1-h6 | Content + line breaks | | li | Content + line break | | a | Text [url] (if option enabled) | | script, style | Completely removed | | img | Alt text (if present) | ### Quality Features - Proper Unicode handling - Entity decoding (named and numeric) - Whitespace normalization - Clean output formatting ## Best Practices and Tips ### For Email Text Versions **Structure your text:** - Use line breaks to separate sections - Include link URLs for CTAs - Keep formatting simple - Test in text-only email clients **Example output:** ``` Newsletter Title Welcome to our newsletter! Read our latest article: https://example.com/article Unsubscribe: https://example.com/unsubscribe ``` ### For Content Extraction **Clean up results:** - Remove navigation text - Filter out footer content - Keep main content only - Check for extraction artifacts ### For Accessibility **Ensure readability:** - Preserve logical reading order - Include image alt text - Keep link context - Maintain structure via spacing ## Understanding Text Output ### Whitespace Handling **Original HTML:** ```html

First paragraph.

Second paragraph.

``` **Text output (with breaks):** ``` First paragraph. Second paragraph. ``` ### Link Handling **Original HTML:** ```html Visit our site ``` **Text output (with URLs):** ``` Visit our site [https://example.com] ``` ### Entity Decoding | Entity | Decoded | |--------|----------| | & | & | | < | < | | > | > | | " | " | |   | (space) | | ' | ' | ## Comparison with Alternatives | Feature | Our Tool | Browser Copy/Paste | Scripts | |---------|----------|-------------------|----------| | Control | Full options | None | Customizable | | Speed | Instant | Instant | Varies | | Consistency | Reliable | Varies by browser | Depends | | Line Breaks | Configurable | Browser-dependent | Customizable | ## Frequently Asked Questions ### Will formatting be completely removed? Yes, all HTML tags and styling are removed. Only text content remains. Basic structure is preserved through line breaks if that option is enabled. ### What happens to images? Images are removed since they are not text. If images have alt text, that text can be preserved in the output. ### How are nested elements handled? Content from nested elements is extracted in order of appearance. The structural relationships may be reflected in line breaks but not in indentation. ### Can I extract text from specific elements only? This tool extracts all text. For selective extraction, you may need to pre-process the HTML to isolate the content you want. ### What encoding is used for output? Output is UTF-8 encoded, supporting all Unicode characters including special symbols and international text. ### Does it work with malformed HTML? The tool handles most malformed HTML gracefully, extracting text content even when tags are improperly nested or closed. ## Conclusion Converting HTML to plain text is essential for email marketing, content processing, and accessibility. Our free HTML to Text converter provides clean text extraction with configurable options for line breaks, link handling, and entity decoding. Extract clean text from your HTML content today with our simple, fast converter. [Use HTML to Text Converter](/tools/convert/html-to-text)
